name: Clinica Esperanza
description: MNHC’s Clinica Esperanza (Clinic of Hope) offers a continuum of HIV treatment services. Bilingual, compassionate medical care, and supportive services for people living with HIV.
fullDescription: MNHC’s Clinica Esperanza (Clinic of Hope) offers a continuum of HIV treatment services. Bilingual, compassionate medical care, and supportive services for people living with HIV.
whatTheyOffer: MNHC’s Clinica Esperanza (Clinic of Hope) offers a continuum of HIV treatment services. Bilingual, compassionate medical care, and supportive services for people living with HIV.
